description: The DetectEntities operation is deprecated. You should use the  DetectEntitiesV2 operation instead. Inspects the clinical text for a variety of medical entities and returns specific information about them such as entity category, location, and confidence score on that information.

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: A UTF-8 text string containing the clinical content being examined for entities.

nested_items.name: Entities
nested_items.description: The collection of medical entities extracted from the input text and their associated information. For each entity, the response provides the entity text, the entity category, where the entity text begins and ends, and the level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the detection and analysis. Attributes and traits of the entity are also returned.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The numeric identifier for the entity. This is a monotonically increasing id unique within this response rather than a global unique identifier.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of the detection.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The segment of input text extracted as this entity.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of the entity.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Describes the specific type of entity with category of entities.

nested_items.name: Traits
nested_items.description: Contextual information for the entity.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Provides a name or contextual description about the trait.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of this trait.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: The extracted attributes that relate to this entity.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of attribute.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the segment of text is correctly recognized as an attribute.

nested_items.name: RelationshipScore
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that this attribute is correctly related to this entity.

nested_items.name: RelationshipType
nested_items.description: The type of relationship between the entity and attribute. Type for the relationship is OVERLAP, indicating that the entity occurred at the same time as the Date_Expression.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The numeric identifier for this attribute. This is a monotonically increasing id unique within this response rather than a global unique identifier.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The segment of input text extracted as this attribute.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of attribute.

nested_items.name: Traits
nested_items.description: Contextual information for this attribute.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Provides a name or contextual description about the trait.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of this trait.

nested_items.name: UnmappedAttributes
nested_items.description: Attributes extracted from the input text that we were unable to relate to an entity.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the unmapped attribute, could be one of the following values: 'MEDICATION', 'MEDICAL_CONDITION', 'ANATOMY', 'TEST_AND_TREATMENT_PROCEDURE' or 'PROTECTED_HEALTH_INFORMATION'.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The specific attribute that has been extracted but not mapped to an entity.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of attribute.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the segment of text is correctly recognized as an attribute.

nested_items.name: RelationshipScore
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that this attribute is correctly related to this entity.

nested_items.name: RelationshipType
nested_items.description: The type of relationship between the entity and attribute. Type for the relationship is OVERLAP, indicating that the entity occurred at the same time as the Date_Expression.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The numeric identifier for this attribute. This is a monotonically increasing id unique within this response rather than a global unique identifier.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The segment of input text extracted as this attribute.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of attribute.

nested_items.name: Traits
nested_items.description: Contextual information for this attribute.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Provides a name or contextual description about the trait.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of this trait.

nested_items.name: PaginationToken
nested_items.description: If the result of the previous request to DetectEntities was truncated, include the PaginationToken to fetch the next page of entities.

nested_items.name: ModelVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the model used to analyze the documents. The version number looks like X.X.X. You can use this information to track the model used for a particular batch of documents.
